report.title: Forgotten Flight
report.author: Rory47
report.bodytext: A few weeks ago I was flying from NY to Detroit. My flight kept getting delayed, so I decided to take my normal prescribed dose at 5:00pm instead of 11:00pm. /n /n As it turned out, like 30 minutes later they started boarding and it was a only 2 hour flight. Though I do not remember it, I must have went unconscious on the airline. /n /n I had airline blankets and 'Skymall' magazines when I woke up at my friends house the next day. /n /n I had so little memory of that night, I needed to be reminded of just about everything. It was kind of scary, not knowing what happened. I was with a trustworthy friend, but if I was not, I would have a full night blank.
